title: Pompeii: once there was a city
creator_credit: Reva Schlesinger, Sol Kaplan and RSK Productions
brief_description: Explores the ruins of the ancient city of Pompeii which was buried by volcanic lava in 79 AD. Recreates the everyday lives of its citizens, interspersed with shots of modern day living to suggest contemporary parallels. Suitable for lower and middle secondary levels.
